body.name: Lifewit 100L Laundry Basket with Lid, Clothes Hampers for Laundry with Bamboo Handles and A Removable Laundry Bag, Large Foldable Laundry Hamper for Bedroom, Bathroom, Dorm, Laundry Room, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 18 mins
features: Essential Organizer: Store dirty clothes, blankets, shoes and more with this laundry hamper. With its lid design, you can place it in your bedroom, bathroom, laundry room and college dorm. Ideal for home storage use, its neutral style matches any decor.

Removable Inner Bag: Secured on all sides by 4 olive buckles, this dirty clothes hamper has a removable inner bag for easy carry and separation from the inner basket. The clothes basket’s cover design prevents the spread of odors and provides you with a tidy environment.

Large Capacity: Measuring 16.9” x 12.6” 29.5” (43 x 32 x 75 cm) and with a capacity of 100L, this large laundry basket can hold 2-3 loads of clothes with ease. The sturdy and freestanding structure can bear up to 26.5lbs/12kg of load without collapsing.

Easy to Install & Fold: Our clothes hamper with lid is designed with easy assembly in mind. Just insert 4 included support rods into the corners and the basket will stand upright. Likewise, remove the poles when not in use and fold for easy storage.
Easy to Carry: Made of high quality polyester fabric and bamboo, this laundry bin is light and easy to carry. Two bamboo handles provide firm and steady grip when moving from a room to another.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Simple & Elegant Storage Solution Give your messy home an instant makeover with Lifewit Laundry Basket. Choose from 2 colors to match your home decor.
Don’t worry, Lifewit laundry hamper will tidy your home.

Previous page Removable Inner Bag Easy to take out clothes without having to move the whole laundry basket. Easy to Move Two bamboo handles for portability and easy carry. With Lid Easy to open and close, prevent odor and protect the clothes inside. Next page 1 Removable Inner Bag 2 Easy to Move 3 With Lid

How to Assemble? Step 1 Spread out the folded support rods. Step 2 Put the support rods into fixed insert tubes and push them under the bamboo edge. Step 3 Wrap the support rod with hook & loop. Step 4 Tie olive buckles into suspension loops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dirty laundry bag
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical about these new type laundry baskets, the way they are made but it only took a minute to put together and I was pleasantly surprised at how well it works for just me in my bedroom. It is big enough to hold enough dirty clothes until I have enough for a whole wash load. I rent a room so I basically live out of my bedroom so you can imagine how packed things can get so I am very happy that this takes up very little room. With the way it is designed, it can be collapsed in just a minute or two and take up very little room if you are thinking of using it for travel. I got it to replace a larger hamper that was just too big and bulky causing me to not have any floor space in my bedroom so I am extremely pleased that I decided to get this. Now I can get rid of my old bulky one, thank goodness. It is not really heavy duty but if used properly with care I see no reason that it shouldn't last a good while. If you are looking for something heavy duty then you need to go with a plastic one but as far as my needs, this is just fine.

reviews.reviewerName: Tyreese and Shonica SmithersTyreese and Shonica Smithers
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and sturdy, laundry basket
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This laundry basket is large and sturdy plus easy to assemble. I was looking for a laundry basket that can hold a lot of laundry and has a lid to cover the laundry until wash day. My other laundry kept me washing clothes every day because I did not want the bathroom to look messy and cluttered with loads of items that needed to be washed. Plus, it did not have a lid on it to cover up the mess . This laundry basket is very aesthetically pleasing to the eye, and it hides your dirty laundry until wash day with the lid that is connected to the basket and a bamboo rid that keeps it sturdy. It is very large and deep and looks like it hold about 3 to 4 loads. It also has a bag that’s removable with handles in an adjustable strain so that you can close the laundry bag and move it whenever you please without moving the entire basket but if you choose to move the whole basket, it has handles so you may move as you please. It took every bit of five minutes to assemble this basket and slide it into place in the bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Looking Hamper
reviews.reviewText: Received my hampers and had to assemble them. Was very easy and simple to assemble with tent style spring poles. They look great and are bigger than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: This hamper is perfect. It’s not too wide, but it’s tall, so it looks like it will hold a lot of laundry. It’s very sleek and not bulky like my old hamper. It feels really solid and I love the detachable bag! All in all, this purchase was a win for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Sturdy and Elegant
reviews.reviewText: Very nice design and simple to put together. Stands nicely looks sleek. Fairly large volume for how it looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size, great price
reviews.reviewText: Great sturdy laundry basket with lid. Very good quality for what you pay for. It will fit in any casual setting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The inside laundry bag ripped apart fast
reviews.reviewText: The outside part with the lid is fine- but the inside bag (the actual laundry bag) fell apart in tatters in less than 3 months, basically rendering the whole thing useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looks fancy!
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of my ugly and floppy laundry basket, but I also did not want something chunky and large, or expensive. This is the perfect solution. The little bag inside it comes off easily and can be placed back into it and is secure with buttons. The lid is a blessing. When you have guests coming to your room (for some reason) you don't have to worry about your old socks or your floppy bra showing in the bag. The bag being black also protects your privacy if you have to go to a laundry room. It is not an eye-sore for the corner of your room either. It looks rigid and nice. if you doubting to get it, just get it.

reviews.reviewText: This item is aa its been described by the seller. Its very easy to assamble, spacious, strong 8and it looks really nice. Will definitely recommend👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Very impressive, easy to assemble, good quality, 80L laundry hamper.
reviews.reviewText: This really nice quality, laundry hamper by Lifewit, is very easy to assemble and also to disassemble for storage if you ever need to.it has a 80L capacity, which is fine for a small family of 3 or 4, but may not be quite big enough for a family, any larger. That is, unless you are intending to put the washing machine on every day.I particularly like the removable drawstring lining bag that fits inside the hamper and is held in place by four tiny toggles similar to duffle coat buttons. I also like the bamboo rim that acts as sturdy flat base for the lid to sit on and doubles as carrying handles for safely moving the hamper up and down stairs if needed. Alternatively, you could leave the hamper where it is and just remove and refit the lining bag, as and when required.

Nifty idea, helpful in the bathroom as just a generic one for towels, easy to pack away if you need to or are moving! Definitely would not lean on it under any circumstances but it is what it is! Worth the money for sure

reviews.reviewTitle: Très satisfaite de cet achat. Fonctionnel et spacieux.
reviews.reviewText: Je voulais un panier à linge qui soit spacieux tout en étant léger et élégant et ce produit remplit exactement ces critères.
Muy buen producto al precio idóneo
